welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villas, an enchanting city known for its charming atmosphere. Take a stroll through our picturesque streets, indulge in our local delicacies, and immerse yourself in our rich culture. We hope you have a wonderful stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Page Field Airport houses all commercial airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Page Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, with a luxurious lounge and concierge services available.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a strong and reliable connection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southwest Florida International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Southwest Florida International Airport serves mainly domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Southwest Florida International Airport serves mainly domestic flights for Delta, United, and American Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte County Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Charlotte County Airport handles private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naples Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Naples Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Immokalee Airport handles all commercial flights and serves as the primary hub for passenger services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Immokalee Airport is dedicated to handling private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
